title: Rightmove Property Scraper
description: Extract UK property listings from Rightmove with comprehensive details including prices, descriptions, images, agent information, and property features

startUrl.title: Search URL
startUrl.description: Rightmove property search URL. Leave empty to use search parameters below.

searchLocation.title: Search Location
searchLocation.description: Location name to search for properties (e.g., 'London', 'Manchester', 'Birmingham')

locationIdentifier.title: Location Identifier
locationIdentifier.description: Rightmove location identifier (e.g., REGION^87490 for London). Leave empty to search by location name.

radius.title: Search Radius
radius.description: Search radius from location in miles

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Property Details
collectDetails.description: Visit each property page to extract complete information including full description, all images, floorplans, and agent details. Increases runtime but provides comprehensive data.

maxResults.title: Maximum Properties
maxResults.description: Maximum number of properties to collect (1-1000)

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages
maxPages.description: Maximum number of result pages to process (each page contains ~24 properties)

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for requests. Residential proxies recommended to avoid blocking.
